subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Matz felt a tugging sensation near his left armpit after his first start, but it was not thought to be serious. An M.R.I. revealed a torn latissimus muscle.
snippet: Matz felt a tugging sensation near his left armpit after his first start, but it was not thought to be serious. An M.R.I. revealed a torn latissimus muscle.
